email_chain.subject: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

We are looking for a suitable vessel to transport 12,500 MT of sunflower seeds from Odessa, Ukraine, to Alexandria, Egypt. The incoterm is CIF. Can you provide a freight quote and vessel options?

Regards,
Anna Lee
Pacific Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Hi Anna,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the MV "Sea Breeze" (DWT 28,000, LOA 175m) for this voyage. Her current position is near Istanbul. The laycan is flexible, between March 20-25. Our initial freight quote is USD 38 per MT, lumpsum $475,000. Let me know your thoughts.

Best,
Robert Jones
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Robert,

Thanks for the quick response. The USD 38/MT is a little higher than our budget allows. Could you come down to USD 36/MT? Also, please provide the demurrage rate per day.

Thanks,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Anna,

I understand. I can meet you halfway at USD 37/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 8,500 per day. Let me know if this works for you, and we can proceed with the booking.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Robert,

USD 37/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laytime allowed for loading and discharging.

Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Anna,

Laytime allowed is 72 hours for loading and 72 hours for discharging. Let me know if you need any other information.

Best,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Robert,

Great. We agree to the terms. Please send over the charter party for review.

Thanks,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Dear Anna,

Hope you're having a productive week.

We have an enquiry for the following:

Commodity: Wheat
Quantity: 25,000 MT +/- 10%
Loading Port: Constanta, Romania
Discharge Port: Jeddah, Saudi Arabia
Incoterms: CIF
Laycan: Nov 15-20, 2024

Please provide your best lumpsum freight offer. 

Best regards,
Steve Harding
Fairview Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Steve,

Thanks for the enquiry. We have several vessels that could be suitable.

Our initial lumpsum offer is USD 625,000 all in, based on your stated requirements.

What are your target rates for the Bendsura?
Can you confirm the maximum draft at Constanta?

Regards,
Anna Kramer
Global Grain Corp

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Anna,

Thanks for the quick response.

USD 625,000 is a bit high. We were targeting something closer to USD 590,000. 
Maximum draft at Constanta is 11.5 meters.

Any chance of improving your offer?

Best,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Steve,

I've discussed with owners. Best we can do is USD 610,000, given the current market conditions and prompt laycan. Vessel is the *Bendsura*, DWT 35,000 MT, built 2010.

This is our firm offer, valid for 24 hours.

Regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Anna,

USD 610,000 is still above our target. Would you consider USD 600,000, with a demurrage rate of USD 10,000 per day?

Regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Steve,

Okay, we can agree to USD 600,000 lumpsum and demurrage at USD 10,000 per day. Please confirm acceptance.

Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah - CONFIRMED
email_chain.body:
Anna,

Confirmed! USD 600,000 lumpsum, demurrage USD 10,000 per day.

Thanks for your assistance.

Regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam - CONFIRMED

Best regards,
Charles Bingley
Globex Shipping

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

Hope you're having a good week.

We have an urgent inquiry for a petcoke shipment of approximately 45,000 MT from Richards Bay, South Africa, to Rotterdam, Netherlands. Could you provide us with your best freight offer for this movement?

Incoterm: FOB Richards Bay.

We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Sofia Andrews
Seawise Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

Thank you for the inquiry. We can offer you our MV 'OCEAN SPIRIT' (DWT: 75,000, LOA: 225m) for this voyage. Our initial lumpsum offer is USD 950,000, basis FOB Richards Bay, discharge Rotterdam.

Laycan: February 15-20, 2024.

Please advise if this is of interest.

Regards,
Ben Carter
Global Trade Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

Thank you for the prompt response.

USD 950,000 is a bit high for our budget. Could you possibly come down to USD 900,000? Also, what is your demurrage rate in Rotterdam?

Best regards,
Sofia Andrews
Seawise Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

We can meet you in the middle at USD 925,000. Our demurrage rate in Rotterdam is USD 15,000 per day, pro-rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Regards,
Ben Carter
Global Trade Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

USD 925,000 is acceptable, but we need a loading window of 72 hours in Richards Bay. Is this something you can accommodate?

Best regards,
Sofia Andrews
Seawise Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

Yes, we can accommodate the 72-hour loading window in Richards Bay. So to confirm:

- Vessel: OCEAN SPIRIT
- Cargo: 45,000 MT Petcoke
- Load Port: Richards Bay
- Discharge Port: Rotterdam
- Laycan: February 15-20, 2024
- Freight: USD 925,000 (Lumpsum)
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day, pro-rata
- Loading Window: 72 hours
- Incoterm: FOB Richards Bay

Please confirm these details.

Regards,
Ben Carter
Global Trade Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

Confirmed. All details are correct. Please proceed with the charter party.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Sofia Andrews
Seawise Brokers

email_chain.subject: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

We have a spot enquiry for approximately 75,000 MT of Petcoke from Houston, USA to Rotterdam, Netherlands on FOB terms. We require a vessel with suitable deadweight and the ability to load at the assigned terminal in Houston.

Please provide a freight indication, along with vessel options and their respective DWT and LOA.

Best regards,
Alex Johnson
SeaFreight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the enquiry. We can offer the vessel 'EVER SUCCESS', DWT 82,000 MT, LOA 225m. She is currently ballasting towards the US Gulf. 

Our initial lumpsum rate is USD 1,275,000, all inclusive.

Laycan: Feb 15-20, Houston

Let me know your thoughts.

Regards,
Robert Williams
Oceanic Trades

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

Thanks for the quick response. The 'EVER SUCCESS' looks suitable. However, USD 1,275,000 seems a little high based on current market levels. Can you sharpen your pencil on the lumpsum?

Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the laytime allowed?

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Understood on the lumpsum. We can reduce to USD 1,250,000, which is our best offer.

Laytime allowed is 72 hours weather permitting. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam - Almost there...
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

USD 1,250,000 is closer to our target. Would you be able to meet us halfway at USD 1,237,500? If so, we can likely confirm this immediately.

Thanks,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam - CONFIRMED
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Okay, we agree to USD 1,237,500 lumpsum. Consider the 'EVER SUCCESS' fixed.

Please send over the charter party for review and confirmation.

Thanks,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam - CONFIRMED
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

Great news! Charter Party attached. We will review and revert shortly.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Olivia,

Marubeni Energy is seeking a vessel for a crude oil shipment from Ras Tanura to Rotterdam. Cargo size is approximately 260,000 MT, +/- 10%. Incoterms are FOB Ras Tanura. Can you offer a suitable VLCC with laycan between November 15-20?

Best regards,
Kenji Tanaka

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Kenji,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the VLCC 'Seafarer Majestic', DWT 318,000, LOA 332m. Our initial lumpsum offer is USD 3,800,000, plus standard commissions. Laycan as requested. 

Please advise if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Olivia Rodriguez
SeaSolutions Maritime

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Olivia,

Thanks for the prompt offer. USD 3.8 million is a bit above our budget. Could you improve the rate? Also, what is the vessel's age and flag? What is the demurrage rate?

Best,
Kenji

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Kenji,

The 'Seafarer Majestic' is 12 years old, flying the Marshall Islands flag. Considering those factors, we can reduce the lumpsum to USD 3,650,000. Demurrage is USD 45,000 per day, pro rata.

Looking forward to your reply.

Regards,
Olivia

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Olivia,

USD 3,650,000 is better. Could you meet us halfway at USD 3,575,000? We are ready to commit if you can agree.

Thanks,
Kenji

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Kenji,

Agreed. USD 3,575,000 it is. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the charter party.

Best,
Olivia

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Olivia,

Confirmed! We accept the lumpsum rate of USD 3,575,000 for the 'Seafarer Majestic'. Please send over the charter party. 

Thank you for your assistance.

Kenji Tanaka

email_chain.subject: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Dear Sirs,

Best regards,
SeaShip Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Good Morning,

Thank you for your quick response. USD 750,000 is above our target. The laycan is suitable. Can you improve on the lumpsum? Also, please confirm the vessel's draft and loading rate at Richards Bay.

Regards,
BulkTrans Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Dear Sirs,

The 'Ocean Dream' has a draft of 12.5 meters. Loading rate at Richards Bay is approximately 10,000 MT per day. We can come down to USD 725,000 lumpsum, CFR Vizag, basis all other details remaining as previously advised.

Best regards,
SeaShip Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Good Day,

Thank you for the updated offer. We appreciate your flexibility. We counter at USD 710,000 lumpsum, CFR Vizag. Please also provide the demurrage rate at both loading and discharge ports.

Regards,
BulkTrans Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Dear Sirs,

We accept your counteroffer of USD 710,000 lumpsum, CFR Vizag. Demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day at both loading and discharge ports. Please confirm acceptance so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
SeaShip Solutions

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag, MV Ocean Dream
email_chain.body:
Good Day,

Confirmed. We accept the terms as agreed. Please send over the charter party for our review. Thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
BulkTrans Chartering

email_chain.subject: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam

Ben Carter
Star Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

Excellent, I am glad we could come to an agreement. The charter party will be sent within the hour.

Best regards,
Olivia Davis
OceanConnect

email_chain.subject: Offer for Petcoke Shipment - Richards Bay to Ghent
email_chain.body:
Dear Simone,

Good morning. We have a potential vessel for your petcoke shipment from Richards Bay to Ghent. Please see details below:

- Quantity: 65,000 MT +/- 10%
- Incoterms: FOB Richards Bay

Nordic Brokers

Simone Duval

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Petcoke Shipment - Richards Bay to Ghent

Nordic Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Petcoke Shipment - Richards Bay to Ghent

Galactic Shipping
